title: About Me
text:
Chris Liu
I am currently attending Baruch College in the Zicklin School of Business. I am pursuing a MS in Statistics with a focus in data science. I hope to pursue a career within statistical machine learning after graduation. If youâ€™re interested in getting connected, here is my LinkedIn profile.
I graduated with a B.S. in Mechanical Engineering from Boston University in 2021. Some of my previous work done in my undergraduate courses can be found in my mechanical engineering project portfolio.
